page.title: 13EMPLOYMENT
page.content: A variety of occupations are shared by the residents of the area.Many of the occupants of houses in Cambo village are retired.Many of these were employed by the National Trust.Others living in the village are still employed by the National Trust and include office staff,gardener,joiner electrician,stone mason and woodman. The school caretaker,village hall caretaker,an air stewardess,painter and decorator and a car and van sales representative also reside in Cambo.Other occupations enjoyed by those in Scots Gap and the surrounding area are,clerks secretaries,bar maids,cleaners,shop keepers,quarry worker,lorry drivers,coal miner,road repairer ,council worker,farmers and farm workers.Many people act as part-time guides at Wallington Hall.
